text: <!channel>: I started working for Intel before the 80386 was a product. After a fantastic career there, I retired last week. I plan to continue working, but I’m not sure whether it will be related to Blockchain or not. As such, I’ve decided to pass the leadership of the Requirements Working Group to someone else. <@U0KM61BCP> will be asking for volunteers at the F2F tomorrow. I will certainly work with  the next leader to make the transition as simple as possible.
